alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL JEFFERSON...NORTHERN TAYLOR AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of Monticello to near Perry. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, lightning and wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...These storms will interupt recovery efforts after Hurricane Idalia. Tarps on homes could blow away. Risk of lightning strikes are increased. Weakened trees could fall in lower wind gusts than normal. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Perry, Greenville, Hells Half Acre, Ebb, Lamont, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Foley, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove, Lake Miccosukee, and Goose Pasture. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building or vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
